Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2009 01:47AM Janathan wrote: When telling a friend on the phone that I recently had BMX's, she said, "Well, you volunteered for that, right?"  Yeah, right...I had nothing better to do so thought I'd add it to my "to do" list. She never has been the sharpest tool in the shed! After my BMX from my Dad:  "Well, you weren't going to win any contests with the ones you had anyway."  Hey, you gotta know my Dad...he was joking around because I was so small breasted.  I actually laughed at that one, but only because it came from my Dad!
Posts.Title: 100 things never to say to a woman who has had a mastectomy: iwannabefree jillyG
